languages.text: "Преступный сговор с капитаном судна "Бессердечный" с целью хищения десятины. Прибыв на Райкад Минорис, Вольный Торговец помог{mf||ла} капитану Саргоне погрузить десятину на корабль под прикрытием планетарного бунта. Позже {name} фон Валанциус устранил{mf||а} сообщника, использовав силы Адептус Арбитес, возглавляемые проктором Антаром. Проктор попытался утолить жадность Вольного Торговца, предложив фрегат "Бессердечный" в обмен на сохранность десятины".

"Conspiring with the captain of the Heartless to steal the sacred tithe. Upon arriving on Rykad Minoris, the Rogue Trader aided Captain Sargona in loading the tithe onto his ship under the cover of a planetary riot. {name} von Valancius later eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice using Adeptus Arbites forces led by Proctor Anthar. The Proctor attempted to appease the Rogue Trader's greed by offering the frigate known as the Heartless in exchange for the safety of the tithe."
languages.original_text: "Преступный сговор с капитаном судна "Бессердечный" с целью хищения десятины. languages.text: "Konspiration mit dem Kapitän der Heartless und Diebstahl des heiligen Zehnts. Nach {mf|seiner|ihrer} Ankunft auf Rykad Minoris half {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} Kapitän Sargona im Schutz planetarer Unruhen bei der Verladung des Zehnts auf sein Schiff. Später tötete {name} von Valancius {mf|seinen|ihren} Komplizen mit den Truppen des Adeptus Arbites unter dem Befehl von Proktor Anthar. Der Proktor versuchte, die Gier {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu stillen, indem er ihm die Fregatte Heartless im Tausch für die Sicherheit des Zehnts anbot."
languages.original_text: "Conspiring with the captain of the Heartless to steal the sacred tithe. Upon arriving on Rykad Minoris, the Rogue Trader aided Captain Sargona in loading the tithe onto his ship under the cover of a planetary riot. {name} von Valancius later eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice using Adeptus Arbites forces led by Proctor Anthar. The Proctor attempted to appease the Rogue Trader's greed by offering the frigate known as the Heartless in exchange for the safety of the tithe."

Der Proktor versuchte, die Gier {mf|des Freihändlers|der Freihändlerin} zu stillen, indem er ihm die Fregatte Heartless im Tausch für die Sicherheit des Zehnts anbot."

languages.text: « Conspiration avec le capitaine du Sans-Cœur dans le but de voler la dîme sacrée. À son arrivée sur Rykad Minoris, {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} a aidé le capitaine Sargona à charger la dîme à bord de son vaisseau sous prétexte d'un soulèvement planétaire. {name} von Valancius a par la suite éliminé son complice en utilisant les forces de l'Adeptus Arbites placées sous le commandement du proctor Anthar, bien que ce dernier ait tenté d'apaiser la cupidité {mf|du libre-marchand|de la libre-marchande} en lui offrant la frégate nommée Sans-Cœur en échange de la sécurité de la dîme. »
languages.original_text: "Conspiring with the captain of the Heartless to steal the sacred tithe. Upon arriving on Rykad Minoris, the Rogue Trader aided Captain Sargona in loading the tithe onto his ship under the cover of a planetary riot. {name} von Valancius later eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice using Adeptus Arbites forces led by Proctor Anthar. The Proctor attempted to appease the Rogue Trader's greed by offering the frigate known as the Heartless in exchange for the safety of the tithe."

languages.text: “被告{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯与‘无心号’舰长合谋，盗取神圣什一税。行商浪人抵达小莱卡德后，在当地暴乱的掩护下，协助萨戈纳舰长将什一税装载到他的船上。随后，行商浪人利用安萨监察官率领的法务部小队，亲手消灭了{mf|他|她}的同谋。为了满足行商浪人的贪婪，安萨监察官提出‘无心号’护卫舰将归行商浪人所有，以此换取神圣什一税的安全。”
languages.original_text: "Conspiring with the captain of the Heartless to steal the sacred tithe. Upon arriving on Rykad Minoris, the Rogue Trader aided Captain Sargona in loading the tithe onto his ship under the cover of a planetary riot. {name} von Valancius later eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice using Adeptus Arbites forces led by Proctor Anthar. The Proctor attempted to appease the Rogue Trader's greed by offering the frigate known as the Heartless in exchange for the safety of the tithe."

traits.locale_text: “被告{name}·冯·瓦兰修斯与‘无心号’舰长合谋，盗取神圣什一税。行商浪人抵达小莱卡德后，在当地暴乱的掩护下，协助萨戈纳舰长将什一税装载到他的船上。随后，行商浪人利用安萨监察官率领的法务部小队，亲手消灭了{mf|他|她}的同谋。为了满足行商浪人的贪婪，安萨监察官提出‘无心号’护卫舰将归行商浪人所有，以此换取神圣什一税的安全。”

languages.text: «Conspirar con el capitán de la Desalmada para robar el sagrado diezmo. Al llegar a Rykad Minoris, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente ayudó al capitán Sargona a cargar el diezmo a su nave al abrigo de la rebelión planetaria. {name} von Valancius eliminó después a su cómplice con fuerzas del Adeptus Arbites lideradas por el Procurador Anthar. El Procurador trató de saciar la avaricia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ofreciendo la fragata conocida como la Desalmada a cambio de la seguridad del diezmo».
languages.original_text: "Conspiring with the captain of the Heartless to steal the sacred tithe. Upon arriving on Rykad Minoris, the Rogue Trader aided Captain Sargona in loading the tithe onto his ship under the cover of a planetary riot. {name} von Valancius later eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice using Adeptus Arbites forces led by Proctor Anthar. The Proctor attempted to appease the Rogue Trader's greed by offering the frigate known as the Heartless in exchange for the safety of the tithe."

traits.locale_text: «Conspirar con el capitán de la Desalmada para robar el sagrado diezmo. El Procurador trató de saciar la avaricia de{mf|l| la} Comerciante Independiente ofreciendo la fragata conocida como la Desalmada a cambio de la seguridad del diezmo».

languages.text: 「聖なる租税を盗むためにハートレスのキャプテンと共謀した。ライカド・ミノリスに到着した際、ローグトレーダーは惑星の暴動の混乱に乗じて、キャプテン・サルゴナが租税を船に積み込むのを手助けした。{name}・フォン・ヴァランシウスは後に、高等裁定局の部隊を率いるアンサール代理人を使って共犯者を排除した。代理人は租税の安全を交換条件に、ハートレスと呼ばれるフリゲート艦をローグトレーダーの強欲をなだめるために差し出そうとした」
languages.original_text: "Conspiring with the captain of the Heartless to steal the sacred tithe. Upon arriving on Rykad Minoris, the Rogue Trader aided Captain Sargona in loading the tithe onto his ship under the cover of a planetary riot. {name} von Valancius later eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice using Adeptus Arbites forces led by Proctor Anthar. The Proctor attempted to appease the Rogue Trader's greed by offering the frigate known as the Heartless in exchange for the safety of the tithe."

languages.text: "Kutsal aşarı çalmak üzere Taşkalp'in kaptanıyla birlikte komplo düzenleme. Rykad Minoris'e ayak basan Hür Tacir, gezegen çapında çıkmış isyanın ardına saklanarak aşarın Kaptan Sargona'nın gemisine yüklenmesine yardım etmiştir. Daha sonra {name} von Valancius, Üsteğmen Anthar önderliğindeki Adeptus Arbites kuvvetlerinden faydalanarak suç ortağını bertaraf etmiştir. Üsteğmen, aşarın güvenliği karşılığında Taşkalp adıyla bilinen fırkateyni armağan etmek suretiyle Hür Tacir'in hain planının önüne geçme teşebbüsünde bulunmuştur."
languages.original_text: "Conspiring with the captain of the Heartless to steal the sacred tithe. Upon arriving on Rykad Minoris, the Rogue Trader aided Captain Sargona in loading the tithe onto his ship under the cover of a planetary riot. {name} von Valancius later eliminated {mf|his|her} accomplice using Adeptus Arbites forces led by Proctor Anthar. The Proctor attempted to appease the Rogue Trader's greed by offering the frigate known as the Heartless in exchange for the safety of the tithe."

Daha sonra {name} von Valancius, Üsteğmen Anthar önderliğindeki Adeptus Arbites kuvvetlerinden faydalanarak suç ortağını bertaraf etmiştir.
